Text: it's a bundle combining all of these Slysoft products into one GUI. From there you can start everything.
the info screen says: "Ghost Industries Presents"

I'm not sure if there's a virus/adware in this or not but after installing only ANYDVD HD I keep getting two spoolsv.exe processes running under Windows Task Manager. One of them displays as "unresponsive" under the Applications tab. Even after uninstalling it the problem didn't go away. Now I'm trying to figure out how to remove that extra spoolsv.exe. So be aware.
